document.masterDocTitle: Revision of Nagiella Munroe (Lepidoptera, Crambidae), with the description of a new species from China

figureCitation.captionText: Figures 4 - 8. Habitus of Nagiella species 4 N. hortulatoides male 5 N. inferior male 6 N. quadrimaculalis male 7 Nagia incomitata Swinhoe 1894 female, type, BMNH Pyr., London. 7 A head 8 Nagiella bispina sp. nov. male, holotype.

subSubSection.paragraph: China, Liaoning: Huanren County, Laotuding, 28.VII.2012, leg. Dan-Dan Zhang & Li-Jun Yang (SYSU); Gansu: 1 ♂, Kangxian County, Baiyun Mountain, 1200 m, 3.VII.2018, leg.
